synopsis.p: Reads documents and annotations from TagTog JSON anndoc format.

description.p: reads a ZIP archive exported by TagTog in JSON anndoc format. The archive must be downloaded by exporting a TagTog project.

param-doc.name: annotatorFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the name of the annotator that created the entity or relation in TagTog.

param-doc.name: argumentPrefix
param-doc.p: Prefix of the roles of arguments of relations.

param-doc.name: entitiesLayer
param-doc.p: Layer where to place entity annotations.

param-doc.name: relation
param-doc.p: Relation where to place TagTog relations.

param-doc.name: typeFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store entity and relation types.
